comments.comments_text: Martin Hongla (Verona) has tested the patience of referee Andrea Colombo and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has tested the patience of referee [REFEREE] and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: What a finish that is! Giovanni Simeone (Verona) latches on to a brilliant cross and gets his head on the ball to put it low inside the right post. No chance of stopping that.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a finish that is! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) latches on to a brilliant cross and gets his head on the ball to put it low inside the right post. No chance of stopping that.

comments.comments_text: What a beautiful moment! Kevin Lasagna (Verona) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way inside the right post. Thomas Strakosha just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 0:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a beautiful moment! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way inside the right post. [PLAYER] just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 0:2.

comments.comments_text: Jovane Cabral (Lazio) connects with a pass inside the box and slams home into the middle of the goal. The goalkeeper was helpless.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] Cabral ([TEAM]) connects with a pass inside the box and slams home into the middle of the goal. The goalkeeper was helpless.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Luiz Felipe (Lazio) was quite harsh and Andrea Colombo didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Miguel Veloso (Verona) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Felipe Anderson (Lazio) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot inside the left post. His attempt was beyond the reach of Alessandro Berardi, so the score changes to 2:2.
